title: What are some of the future technology trends in business? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology has constantly assumed a significant job in reshaping how businesses work. Regardless of the idea of the business, all businesses need to follow the emerging trends to continue working effectively. Here is Business Technology Trends That Will Reshape The Working Methodology in the Coming Year: The Power of AIGetting Connected with IoT DevicesChatbots for Customer ServicesSoftware UnificationOptimizing Content for Voice SearchImproving Customer Support with VRContinue To Read More…

Information technology is developing from a world that is server-centric to one that is service-centric. Organizations are rapidly moving far from solid systems that were married to one or more servers toward better grained, reusable services circulated inside and outside the endeavor. The objective: to decouple infrastructure, systems, applications, and business processes from each other.
